type.description:
### ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ‚ö†Ô∏è

## Sprinting

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze).

Freezes the entity as if they were in powder snow.

Type ID: `apugli:freeze`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:freeze",
    "should_damage": false
}
```
This example will freeze an entity but will not damage them.
type.markdownDescription:
### ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ‚ö†Ô∏è

## Sprinting

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze).

Freezes the entity as if they were in powder snow.

Type ID: `apugli:freeze`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:freeze",
    "should_damage": false
}
```
This example will freeze an entity but will not damage them.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.

should_damage_condition.description: If set, the entity will only receive damage if this is true. If not set, this entity will always take damage.
should_damage_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the entity will only receive damage if this is true. If not set, this entity will always take damage.

should_damage.description:
#### üö® Depreciated üö®

Whether this power type's freeze should damage the power holder.
should_damage.markdownDescription:
#### üö® Depreciated üö®

Whether this power type's freeze should damage the power holder.
